title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Dec 23 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Dec 23 2021
description:
Clay welcomes back journalist Alex Berenson to discuss the Omicron variant, mask mandates and update the audience on his Twitter lawsuit, which C&B encouraged him to file during his past visits to the show. Biden lays the groundwork for a fourth booster. Minnesota police officer Kim Potter found guilty on both counts for fatally shooting Daunte Wright. Clay promises next year will mark the beginning of the return of American Exceptionalism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
